The 2017 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2017 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2017) was held on 24 October 2017, at the Jeunesse Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Television presenters Fábio Porchat and Tatá Werneck hosted the show.
